price: I pošto bismo ih patnje oslobodili - do vremena do kog im je bilo određeno da je podnose - oni bi, odjednom, obećanje prekršili.
arabic: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلرِّجۡزَ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ هُم بَٰلِغُوهُ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: falammā kashafnā ʿanhumu al-rij'za ilā ajalin hum bālighūhu idhā hum yankuthūna
